code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/plotner/git/HelsinkiFullStackExercises/part3/phonebook-v2/phonebook-frontend/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.request(baseUrl).then(function(request){return request.data;}).catch(function(error){console.log("Error in GET: ",error);return[];});};var addPerson=function addPerson(person){var idPerson=_objectSpread({},person,{id:person.name});return axios.post(baseUrl,idPerson).then(function(request){return 0;}).catch(function(error){console.log("Error in POST: ",error);return 1;});};var updatePerson=function updatePerson(person,newNumber){console.log(person,newNumber);return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(person.name),_objectSpread({},person,{number:newNumber})).then(function(request){return 0;}).catch(function(error){console.log("Error in PUT: ",error);return 1;});};var deletePerson=function deletePerson(person){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(person.name)).then(function(request){return 0;}).catch(function(error){console.log("Error in DELETE: ",error);return 1;});};export default{getAll:getAll,addPerson:addPerson,deletePerson:deletePerson,updatePerson:updatePerson};
